author: Source: South End Standard
title: Tony Pulis hails West Brom attack after win at Norwich - South End Standard
text:
Tony Pulis saw his West Brom side collect their sixth clean sheet of the season with victory at Norwich, but was full of praise for his attacking players. Club-record signing Salomon Rondon scored the only goal of the game at Carrow Road to inflict a third straight defeat on the Canaries.
 South End Standard.
